name: Arc'teryx Aerios FL Mid Gore-Tex Light Hiking Shoes - Women's
categories: Aerios FL Mid Gore-Tex Light Hiking Shoes
description: The mind of a trail runner meets the body of a hiking shoe, the Aerios FL mid-height shoe is designed for rapid travel in remote and varied conditions. The highly durable fabric upper offers a snug and secure fit, like a running shoe, and the TPU overlay and toecap protects the high-wear areas. An integrated TPU shank keeps your feet stable and supported in uneven terrain.Cordura® mesh upper is durable and breathable.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane shelter feet from the elements.Durable TPU film overlay and TPU toecap resist abrasion and protect feet from trail bumps.Mid-height ankle provides support without adding much weight.3D moulded Ortholite™ footbed delivers maximum comfort, breathability and arch support.Compressed EVA midsole cushions underfoot and an integrated TPU shank adds stability on technical trails.Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber outsole provides confident footing in varied terrain.
